channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- User Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- User Management

item.title: CVE-2023-21997|2024-08-02T09:59:28.685Z -- oracle%20corporation -- user%20management
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle User Management product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Proxy User Delegation). Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.3-12.2.12. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle User Management. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle User Management accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
